com.nus.cool.core.io.writestore

Class MetaChunkWS

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nus.cool.core.io.writestore.MetaChunkWS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Output

    public class MetaChunkWS
extends java.lang.Object
implements Output
    MetaChunk write store

    MetaChunk layout ------------------------------------------ | MetaChunkData | header | header offset | ------------------------------------------

    MetaChunkData layout ------------------------------------- | field 1 | field 2 | ... | field N | -------------------------------------

    header layout --------------------------------------- | ChunkType | #fields | field offsets | --------------------------------------- where ChunkType = ChunkType.META #fields = number of fields
